text: Aggressive Behavior is a bimonthly peer-reviewed scientific journal covering research pertaining to aggression in, among other fields, psychology, anthropology, and sociology. It was established in 1974 and is published by John Wiley & Sons on behalf of the International Society for Research on Aggression, of which it is the official journal. The editor-in-chief is Craig Anderson (Iowa State University). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2015 impact factor of 2.469. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Psychology journals Category:Wiley (publisher) academic journals Category:Publications established in 1974 Category:Bimonthly journals Category:Academic journals associated with international learned and professional societies
title: Aggressive Behavior (journal)
